snippet: Former Representative Gabrielle Giffords for the first time confronted Jared L. Loughner, the man who shot her in the head during a rampage last year that left 6 dead and 12 others wounded.
abstract: Jared L Loughner is sentenced in Tucson to seven consecutive life terms by Federal District Court Judge Larry A Burns for 2011 shooting rampage that killed six people and wounded 12 others; former Rep Gabrielle Giffords and her husband Mark E Kelly confront him in court for first time since he shot her during rampage.

byline.contributor: Timothy Williams contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: Former Representative Gabrielle Giffords for the first time confronted Jared L. Loughner, the man who shot her in the head during a rampage last year that left 6 dead and 12 others wounded.

headline.seo: Gunman Who Shot Giffords Sentenced to 7 Life Terms
headline.main: Gunman in Giffords Shooting Sentenced to 7 Life Terms
headline.print_headline: Gunman Gets 7 Life Terms in Tucson Shooting of Congresswoman and Others
